movies.title: El pico
movies.plot: Bilbao, 1980. A right-wing Civil Guard Commander discovers that his 17-year-old son Paco, who he hopes to enter Military Academy, is a heroin addict like Urko, Paco's best friend and the son of a leftist leader. Paco runs away from home taking a gun from his father. While the Commander initiates the search of his son accompanied by the father of Urko, he begins to discover an unknown world and little by little important changes take place in him.
movies.simplePlot: Bilbao, 1980. A right-wing Civil Guard Commander discovers that his 17-year-old son Paco, who he hopes to enter Military Academy, is a heroin addict like Urko, Paco's best friend and the ...

biography.bio: José Luis Manzano was born on December 30, 1963 in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain as José Luis Manzano Agudo. He was an actor, known for El pico 2 (1984), El pico (1983) and Navajeros (1980). He died on February 20, 1992 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: José Luis Manzano

biography.bio: Javier García is an actor and producer, known for El pico (1983), Feroz (1984) and Crimen en familia (1985).
biography.name: Javier García

biography.placeOfBirth: Arona, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain
biography.bio: José Manuel Cervino was born on October 29, 1940 in Arona, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain as José Manuel Cervino Almeida. He is an actor, known for La guerra de los locos (1987), The Last Circus (2010) and Mararía (1998). He has been married to Maite Blasco since 1977.
biography.name: José Manuel Cervino

biography.bio: Luis Iriondo was born on May 26, 1931 in Azkoitia, Guipúzcoa, País Vasco, Spain. He is an actor and composer, known for Companys, procés a Catalunya (1979), El pico (1983) and Otra vuelta de tuerca (1985).
biography.name: Luis Iriondo

biography.bio: Enrique San Francisco was born on March 10, 1955 in Madrid, Spain as Enrique San Francisco Cobo. He is an actor, known for Cuéntame (2001), The Hit (1984) and La crisis carnívora (2007).
biography.name: Enrique San Francisco

biography.bio: Andrea Albani was born on October 13, 1960 in Catalonia, Spain as Eulalia Espinet Borràs. She was an actress and writer, known for El pico 2 (1984), Sexual Desires (1983) and Jóvenes amiguitas buscan placer (1982). She died on January 18, 1994 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia.
biography.name: Andrea Albani

biography.bio: Queta Ariel was born as Enriqueta Cobo. She is an actress, known for El certificado (1970), A Diary of a Murderess (1975) and Deseo (1976).
biography.name: Queta Ariel

biography.bio: At 12 years he worked as an apprentice mechanic, starting as an actor at age 20 and with the theater group of Alcoy natal "Casserole." In the mid-60's economic crisis forced him to emigrate to Barcelona, since then his career combining theatrical Companies Adrià Gual, CIFC and Nuria Espert with forays into the music scene. In 1968 he debuted as a professional singer, a facet that will become one of the main representatives of "Nova Cançó 'Catalan. In this sense, both composed their own songs as musical adaptations of Salvador Espriu, Pere Quart or Vicent Andrés. In the film debuted in 1974 and shortly thereafter obtained a great success for his role in "Stealth"
biography.name: Ovidi Montllor

biography.bio: Marta Molins is a writer and actress, known for Poble Nou (1994), Love in Difficult Times (2005) and Xtrems (2009).
biography.name: Marta Molins

biography.bio: Pedro Nieva Parola is an actor, known for La estanquera de Vallecas (1987), Werther (1986) and El pico (1983).
biography.name: Pedro Nieva Parola

biography.bio: Alfred Lucchetti was born on April 3, 1934 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Alfred Lucchetti Farré. He is known for his work on Poble Nou (1994), Bar-Cel-Ona (1987) and Black Candles (1982). He died on April 8, 2011 in Barcelona.
biography.name: Alfred Lucchetti

biography.bio: Guillermo Reinlein is an actor, known for El pico (1983) and Las pícaras (1983).
biography.name: Guillermo Reinlein

biography.bio: Daughter of the producer Jose Antonio Pérez Giner and Rosario Ferrándiz. She studied journalism in the UAB (Universidad Autónoma de Bellaterra) and photography in the IEFC (Institut d'Estudis Fotogràfics de Catalunya). She started as an actress when just 5 years old, then she worked as a script supervisor and photographer before moving to production roles.
biography.name: Marta Pérez Ferrándiz

biography.placeOfBirth: Sant Antoni de Portmany, Eivissa, Balearic Islands, Spain
biography.bio: Santi Pons was born on October 18, 1950 in Sant Antoni de Portmany, Eivissa, Balearic Islands, Spain. He is an actor, known for El cor de la ciutat (2000), Fausto 5.0 (2001) and Salvador (Puig Antich) (2006).
biography.name: Santi Pons

biography.bio: María Isabel Amayra is an actress, known for El pico (1983).
biography.name: María Isabel Amayra
